page.title: 13 EMPLOYMENT IN KENNINGTON
page.content:
In the {KENNINGTON}area 90% of the adult inhabitants are employed. Of these 56% work in{ASHFORD,}9% WORK IN {LONDON}and a further 35% work in other places. Many people travel into town every day while some other commute regularly to and from{LONDON.} This chart shows the results of our survey: Place of work:{ASHFORD LONDON OTHERS {GROUP ONE }16 1 11 {GROUP TWO }14 1 8 {GROUP THREE } 24 6 13 {GROUP FOUR }10 2 8
Some sources of employment in { {KENNINGTON}are; 3 schools, 2 garages, several shops, a fire station and public houses. As there is very little employment in{KENNINGTON,}most people have to travel at least two miles to their place of work in{ASHFORD.
